snippet.title: Werewolf Vampire War
snippet.description: Werewolf Vampire War Strategy game. Build an army of vampires or werewolves and try to defeat the enemy's base.

snippet.title: Ultimate Army 2
snippet.description: Ultimate Army 2 Strategy game. Try to defend your grounds and take over the enemy bases to win each battle.

snippet.title: Stormy Castle
snippet.description: Stormy Castle Defense game. Your castle is under attack and you need to save it sending troops to destroy the enemy.

snippet.title: Relic Of War
snippet.description: Relic Of War Strategy game. Force your trooops through enemy lines and try to succeed in every war mission.

snippet.title: Clash of the Worlds
snippet.description: Clash of the Worlds Strategy game. Use your army of different warriors to destroy all incoming monster units.

snippet.title: Bubble Tanks TD 2
snippet.description: Bubble Tanks TD 2 Tower defense game. Protect your base and eliminate the enemy bubble tanks that try to take over.

snippet.title: Cobra Squad
snippet.description: Cobra Squad Strategy game. Train and use an army of fighters that can kill and destroy incoming enemy units.

snippet.title: Cobra Squad: Rescue
snippet.description: Cobra Squad: Rescue Strategy game. Build an army of soldiers to attack and destroy all enemy units each round.

snippet.title: My Little Army
snippet.description: My Little Army Play the adventure of three curious heroes to beat the missions and reward winning quests.

snippet.title: Mummy Blaster
snippet.description: Mummy Blaster Arcade game. Use dynamite and place it at the right spots to destroy all mummies each level.
